extensions.description: BTCUSDT is an experimental ERC-20 token on Ethereum designed to mimic BTC-like pricing via the BTCUSDT/WBTC liquidity pool on Uniswap. Total supply is fixed at 5 tokens with 8 decimals.

synthetic-btc.name: Synthetic Bitcoin
synthetic-btc.description: Assets designed to mirror Bitcoin-like behavior.

wrapped-asset.name: Wrapped Asset
wrapped-asset.description: Assets pegged or correlated to another token through AMM liquidity.

experimental.name: Experimental Token
experimental.description: A token created for DeFi, AMM and chart-indexing research.
